post.body: Twitter 'heavies' eh...;)
Exactly ;) Social media = way forward, especially good for grassroots charities and community projects...
Thanks for adding your blog to the forum - I've added to my personal blogroll and will keep any eye on it via Googlereader!
good luck with the interview!
Read this http://snurl.com/79nd9 , would be good to get Guardian to link to donation page or tweet how public can (if we can) help..
more or less, suggestions for quirky questions to ask each other in the speednetworking session are most welcome.. ;)
Ooh why what's gone on??
Great! See you there with (Xmas) baubles on. Erm not literally...
Thanks for following - we'll be following with interest ;)
@ed_walker86 @peter_walker Me too! ;)
Thanks for the retweet! ;)
Hi Ross, Couple of good ones highlighted in my blog http://tinyurl.com/6ywvy8
Hmm...could be a useful resource for you / EMF http://www.doodle.com/main.html #thirdsector
nice blog. Have blogrolled @ http://robpermeable.wordpress.com/
I guess it's more immediate, shorthand blogging, Like instant messenger for...millions of people at once ;) I love it!
Great to see you, Dan. Thanks for coming to the speednetwork / xmas drinks ;)
Glad you can make! See you soon, be nice to catch up, it's been a while :)
Hi there - hmm...should be, do come along - hard to tell how many 'drop outs' there may be. Speednetworking = 7-8pm... ;)
No problem - I'll check with Emma at CC - did you reply via the group link? Be great to see ya, enjoy CRUK drinks first :)
Nice use of social media as advice outlet ;) tweeting advisers. You're really pushing the envelope with embracing SM.. nice.
RT @robpermeable Anyone know of any upcoming Awards for community/work skills progs, I could enter a wk placement scheme for UK disab kids?
A spot of blogger...List your third sector blogs in the facebook group's blog discussion room: http://snurl.com/7tcfk and blog about us ;)
RT @whizzkidz Seasons greetings from Whizz-Kidz. A nice interactive picture of equality ;) http://snurl.com/7qjfm
CharityComms is keen to hear what YOU would like from an Individual Membership Scheme? What would make YOU join? http://snurl.com/7qhy9
Thanks to @problogger for highlighting http://bit.ly/jPVe. Use wisely, non-profit PRO's...no stalking now..!
Can't remember if I ever said welcome to twitter @joannatidball and thanks for all your support and help with the facebook group ;)
Excellent blog on fundraising through twitter for non-profits courtesy of @kanter http://snurl.com/75zan thanks @amyrsward for highlighting
THIS very group and CharityComms are hosting joint Xmas and 'speednetworking' drinks on 17th Dec. Link here for info: http://snurl.com/72mg6
Just come across http://tweetsgiving.org/ v interesting. @kojote @pixelsebi
Last call for #thirdsector types to sign up for speed network Xmas drinks this wednesday, this group + CharityComms: http://snurl.com/72mg6
RT @rachelbeer NFP types: doodle Poll to find date for the next #NFPtweetup. Click here and mark your availability please! http://is.gd/bmWG
Thankyou to everyone who came to the network drinks tonight! Around 60 of you drank the (free) bar dry, exchanged cards & made new pals ;)
Welcome to twitter @charitycomms #thirdsector
